title: Thousands Attend ‘Hands Off’ Protests Across U.S. — and Europe — to Oppose Trump’s Agenda
content:
Terrific photos and summary coverage from The Guardian. Additional coverage from The New York Times, Washington Post, and CNN.

There’s something so bizarrely asymmetrical about Trump’s political support. We saw large scale protests like today’s starting in 2017 too, and in this 2.0 administration, they’re only going to get bigger. Today’s protests were coast-to-coast, in cities large and small. Hundreds of thousands of people. But there were never any protests at all against the Biden administration. Trump’s support has been just wide enough to win, twice, but it’s so thin. His first inauguration was so conspicuously sparsely attended they held the second one indoors. Support for democracy runs deep.

 ★
author: John Gruber
